parameters.name: AccessType
parameters.description:
The mode in which you want to add the domain name to WAF. Set the value to share.

*   **share:** adds the domain name to WAF in CNAME record mode. This is the default value.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name whose access configurations you want to modify.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region where the WAF instance resides. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou:** the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1:** outside the Chinese mainland.
